task: Learning React through a Hello World App
summary_task: In this task, you will learn the basics of React, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces, by creating a simple "Hello World" application. You will set up the development environment, create a new React project, and build a simple UI that displays "Hello World" on the screen.
steps:
Step 1: Install Node.js and npm * Before you start, make sure you have Node.js and npm installed on your computer. You can download Node.js from the official website () and npm is included in the installation. Step 2: Install Create React App * Open your terminal or command prompt and run the following command to install Create React App, a tool for creating React projects: `npm install -g create-react-app` Step 3: Create a new React project * Create a new React project by running the following command: `create-react-app hello-world` * This will create a new directory called "hello-world" with a basic React project. Step 4: Open the project in your code editor * Open the "hello-world" directory in your preferred code editor.
